text:
Hi, I’m using the new Node client 10.2 in local and calling:

```HubSpotClient.crm.lists.membershipsApi```
Works like a charm, but then when I try to use it in a code block in a workflow this crm.lists.membership is not available, I gt this error:
```ERROR	Unhandled Promise Rejection 	{"errorType":"Runtime.UnhandledPromiseRejection","errorMessage":"TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'membershipsApi')","reason":{"errorType":"TypeError","errorMessage":"Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'membershipsApi')",....```
It looks like deployed client version in workflows is 10 but not the last minor release 10.2 which includes the crm.lists new API. Could someone confirm it please? Thanks

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Node-Client-version-10-in-Workflows-has-not-crm-lists-available/m-p/898055#M69955|Community Thread Issue>
